biotools.summary: Integrate high quality animation of molecular motion into structural and functional analysis of macromolecules. Structural annotations such as mapping of known interaction sites from structural homologs, mapping of cavities and ligand binding sites, transmembrane regions and protein domains are also integrated into the visualization.
